body.name: Furmax Electric Standing Desk 55x 24 Inches Height Adjustable Desk Computer Desk T-Shaped Metal Bracket Desk with Memory Settings, Wood Tabletop, and Holes for Routing Cables, White
features: Healthy Working Style: Sitting for long periods of time at work puts a huge strain on our bodies, leading to back and neck problems. This standing desk will bring a healthy way of working, allow you to sit and stand alternatively which help relieving fatigue feeling during long time work, and make you more concentrated.

Durable Quiet Motor: The motor is made of good quality and each has been tested more than ten inspection processes before assembling to the desk. You can adjust the height between 28.7” -45.3” at a speed of 1"/second with low noise.

Memory Electric Lift: Compared with the ordinary workstations, this standing desk can easily control the height using buttons, so that it can be used by people of different heights in different scenes. The design of sitting/standing memory keys allows it to be adjusted quickly and accurately to your preset comfortable height.

Sturdy Desk Legs: The desk legs are box frame structured, though it is made of steel material, it is not that heavy, it offers stableness and sturdiness in use. The wide T-shaped foot design makes the table maintain good stability even when used at the highest height.

Large Wood Desktop: We offer a desktop with a maximum size of 55 x 24 Inches which is made of high class solid wood with round desk corners and wires hole. The table top has large enough space to place stuff, like computer, notebook, working files, and other work supplies.
Warmly Note: The table top is consisted of two pieces, it is not come in one complete piece.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: GET QUANLITY PRODUCTS FOR YOUR HOME Furmax Large Standing Desk This standing desk will bring a healthy way of working，allow you to sit and stand alternatively which help relieving fatigue feeling during long time work, and make you more concentrated.

Large Wood Desktop The desktop is made of high class solid wood with round desk corners and wires hole, has large enough space to place stuff, like computer, notebook, printer, and other office supplies. Memory Electric Lift Compared with the ordinary office desk, this standing desk can easily control the height using buttons, so that it can be used by people of different heights in different scenes. Digital Control Panel This standing desk uses an advanced motor with longer service life, each motor can be used more than 10,000 times. You can adjust the height between 28.7”-45.3”at a speed of 1"/second with low noise. Easy to Assemble Compared with the ordinary office desk, our standing desk uses the upgraded beans and drive shaft to make installation easier. An adult can assemble a table in 15 minutes.
Attention to Details Memory Electric Lift Wide T-shaped Foot Round Corners & Wires Hole Large Wood Desktop

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: For $99 you get what you pay for. This is a fair value for a motorized stand up desk. Takes about 45 minutes to setup. Instructions are what I expect from a Chinese product. Not great, but the pictures are simple enough to follow and labeled appropriately. Materials are of decent quality. Hopefully this lasts a handful of years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: I bought the 55”, it is very spacious.It took me one hour to assemble on my own, great mechanics but a bit load when it goes up or down, no big deal for me.Just what I was looking for at this price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the table. It is affordable and great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Would give five stars except one suggestion
reviews.reviewText: I spend hours every day, studying, and cannot take sitting anymore. I bought this desk and a balancing board, and I now work my core strength while working my mind! Overall, this is a wonderful desk with good dimensions, a very sturdy construction (doesn’t even seem to be phased by my using it as a ballet bar), and a smooth, quiet, quick motor. I also love all the little details – – a hook to hang my bag, a cord clip/organizer, and a cup holder which accommodates all of my various sized drinks so I don’t spill them on my computer. I would give this nifty desk five stars except I have one complaint/suggestion: The edge on which I lean my arms when typing (and my leg when stretching) is quite sharp. I recommend either planing the edge more to make it more rounded, or attaching some type of transparent cover. Besides this one feature, this is the perfect desk for me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love love love this desk
reviews.reviewText: This desk is exactly what I needed. I’ve been frustrated with my old workspace for a long time. My husband assembled this desk in under an hour. Great work space. I love being able to easily adjust the height to stand or sit. Game changer! Great price. Thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this desk! Just a btw when delivered they will leave it outside. Love the raising/lowering feature press the arrow for 3+ seconds and it’ll raise on its own! My corporate desk at my job you have to press and hold until you get to the level you want. The desk is very sturdy, take your time putting it together.I love putting stuff together so this was a breeze! The nails are somewhat hard to distinguish on the manual.I use it for work, sewing, other arts/crafts…and for lunch/dinner.Side note: as someone who was born in the late 90s… this desk could’ve used some drawers. Also I love putting furniture together, if you don’t this will be a bit frustrating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best $140 purchase ever!
reviews.reviewText: I am very impressed with this desk. It took me a touch over an hour to put together and functions flawlessly. I have damaged knees and sitting for any length of time can be painful. This desk allows me to step back and raise the level and go back to work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fine for the price
reviews.reviewText: The desktop comes as 2 pieces (I bought the shortest length) and the seams don’t line up quite right, but it works fine for what I need.
